classData.comment:
/**
 * @summary A generic MCP Client that can connect to any local MCP server via Stdio.
 *
 * This class wraps the official MCP SDK Client in a Neo.mjs class structure.
 * It handles the connection lifecycle and tool discovery.
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.client.Client
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 */
classData.summary:
A generic MCP Client that can connect to any local MCP server via Stdio.

This class wraps the official MCP SDK Client in a Neo.mjs class structure.
It handles the connection lifecycle and tool discovery.
classData.name: Client

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.ai.mcp.client.Client'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * The arguments for the command (e.g. ["./path/to/server.mjs"])
         * @member {String[]|null} args=null // Will be loaded from config
         */
classData.name: args

classData.comment:
/**
         * The name of the client to announce to the server
         * @member {String} clientName='Neo.ai.Agent'
         */
classData.description: The name of the client to announce to the server
classData.name: clientName

classData.comment:
/**
         * The version of the client to announce
         * @member {String} clientVersion='1.0.0'
         */
classData.description: The version of the client to announce
classData.name: clientVersion

classData.comment:
/**
         * The command to run (e.g. "node")
         * @member {String|null} command=null // Will be loaded from config
         */
classData.name: command

classData.comment:
/**
         * Path to a custom client configuration file.
         * @member {String|null} configFile=null
         */
classData.description: Path to a custom client configuration file.
classData.name: configFile

classData.description: Environment variables to pass to the spawned process
classData.name: env

classData.comment:
/**
         * Path to the OpenAPI spec for this server (if available).
         * @member {String|null} openApiFilePath=null
         */
classData.description: Path to the OpenAPI spec for this server (if available).
classData.name: openApiFilePath

classData.comment:
/**
         * List of environment variable names required by the server.
         * @member {String[]} requiredEnv=[]
         */
classData.description: List of environment variable names required by the server.
classData.name: requiredEnv

classData.comment:
/**
         * The logical name of the MCP server to connect to (e.g., 'github-workflow').
         * This name will be used to look up connection details from ClientConfig.
         * @member {String} serverName_='github-workflow'
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description: The logical name of the MCP server to connect to (e.g., 'github-workflow'). This name will be used to look up connection details from ClientConfig.
classData.name: serverName_

classData.comment:
/**
     * The MCP SDK Client instance.
     * @member {McpSdkClient|null} client=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: client

classData.comment:
/**
     * Connection state of the client.
     * @member {Boolean} connected=false
     */
classData.name: connected

classData.description: Map of tool schemas keyed by tool name (from listTools).
classData.name: toolSchemas

classData.comment:
/**
     * The ToolService instance for validation and management.
     * @member {ToolService|null} toolService=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: The ToolService instance for validation and management.
classData.name: toolService

classData.comment:
/**
     * The Transport instance.
     * @member {StdioClientTransport|null} transport=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: transport

classData.comment:
/**
     * @protected
     * @param {String} value
     * @param {String} oldValue
     */
classData.name: afterSetServerName
callTool
close
destroy
listTools

classData.comment:
/**
     * Loads the server connection details from the ClientConfig singleton.
     * @param {String} serverName The name of the server to load.
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Loads the server connection details from the ClientConfig singleton.

params.description: The name of the server to load.
